articles.title: Louise Minchin: BBC Breakfast host 'delighted' for colleague amid announcement of new role - Express
articles.description: LOUISE MINCHIN has reacted to big news as her colleague announced they had landed a brand new role, as the BBC Breakfast host exclaimed: 'I'm delighted.'
